name: Scarletbrand Dusky Goat
description: Apart from having horns and markings with a faint scarlet gleam, the Dusky Goat is no different from its relatives inhabiting other parts of Teyvat.\nTheir long and silky fleece demands frequent grooming. One can't help but wonder how Tubby manages to groom the entire flock...\nFor reasons unknown, some animals that enter the Realm Within retain their peculiar appearance shaped by the force of kuuvahki. To help Tubby identify them, Paimon has thoughtfully given them new names based on said appearance...
